title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-3.3 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-3.3 - Penalties

State Regulations
A violation of any provision of this Subpart is subject to all civil and criminal penalties as provided for by law. For purposes of civil penalties, each individual container or other separate unit of flavored e-liquid, product containing the same, or any component part that imparts flavor to an e-cigarette, that is possessed, manufactured, distribute d, sold, or offered for sale, shall constitute a separate violation under this Subpart. Notes

York State Register October 2, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 40, eff. 9/17/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
